observers.name: observers
observers.label: Observers
observers.helptext: Name of observer(s). If there are multiple observers separate by a semi-colon (;).

agency.name: agency
agency.label: Agency
agency.helptext: Agency or organizations the observers represent

survey_type.name: survey_type
survey_type.label: Survey Type
survey_type.helptext: Select the best option for the type of survey.

source.name: source
source.label: Source
source.helptext: Description of the data source, project, and/or references. For example "2019 NDOW goshawk broadcast survey data form". Leave blank if not noted.

nest_condition.name: nest_condition
nest_condition.label: Nest Condition
nest_condition.helptext: What is the general condition of the nest. Leave blank if not noted

nest_size.name: nest_size
nest_size.label: Nest Size
nest_size.helptext: If this is a stick nest, what is the approximate size of the nest

species.name: species
species.label: Species
species.helptext: Common name for the species observed (choose from dropdown)

adult_behavior.name: adult_behavior
adult_behavior.label: Adult Behavior
adult_behavior.helptext: Description of the behavior of the adults, if observed.

young_stage.name: young_stage
young_stage.label: Young Stage
young_stage.helptext: What stage/age are the young if present.

production_notes.name: production_notes
production_notes.label: Production Notes
production_notes.helptext: Description, such as estimated age of young, etc., if observed.

comments.name: nest_comments
comments.label: Miscellaneous comments detailing any other important information.
